announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch 0.19 - The Rift
announcements.description: Hey all! The Wizard Portal is finally repaired! It only took 3-5 business days. Rumors are that, upon completion, Barry the Wizard (the ex-mayor) took the risk for all of us and stepped into the portal.

announcements.name: [June 14] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!
